mod.name: Stick War 2: Chaos Campaign
mod.description: Play as Queen Medusa, ex-leader of the Chaos Empire! Regain your following and destroy all that stand in your way on your path to reclaim Inamorta!
mod.developers:
Chaos Empire Campaign Mod By: Ryan Scott (AsePlayer), Austin Dressick (Destroyer), & Cecilia Canavati (Purpi)

Sprite Manager: Destroyer & AsePlayer

Creative Consultant: Xecute
Quality Assurance: AsePlayer & Xecute
Lore: AsePlayer, Destroyer, Pax Orderia, & Bloxro_
